title: Pathogen - Sci-Fi Horror Music
description: Pathogen is a high-quality pack of 17 music tracks composed for use in sci-fi horror games.
longDescription:
Pathogen is a harrowing collection of 17 music tracks (12 looping), composed for sci-fi horror games. This pack delves into the chilling realms of space and alien terror, featuring eerie electronic soundscapes, unsettling synths, and menacing atmospheric textures. Perfect for creating a sense of dread and otherworldly fear, Pathogen will immerse your players in a world of cosmic horror, alien infestations, and futuristic nightmares. Whether exploring abandoned space stations, encountering extraterrestrial threats, or escaping bereft research facilities, this pack provides the perfect auditory backdrop for an unforgettable sci-fi horror experience.


Music Demo


This pack contains 15 original tracks with 2 additional alternative versions.


TRACKLIST:

  1. Absolute Zero (Loop) [1:09]
  2. Airlock (Loop) [1:07]
  3. Anticipation (Loop) [1:00]
  4. Control Room (Loop) [1:52]
  5. Deep Space (Loop) [1:00]
  6. Desolate [2:33]
  7. Dimensional Rift (Loop) [1:04]
  8. Distress Beacon Heavy [2:15]
  9. Distress Beacon Light [2:15]
  10. Infection (Loop) [1:46]
  11. Ionization [3:29]
  12. Shadows on the Wall (Loop) [1:42]
  13. Temporal Distortions Heavy (Loop) [1:00]
  14. Temporal Distortions Light (Loop) [1:00]
  15. The Void (Loop) [1:00]
  16. Void Stalker (Loop) [1:36]
  17. 82 Years Later [5:00]



Music Quality:

Pathogen was created with industry-leading software used in professional studios worldwide, each track delivers a polished, high-quality sound, elevating your game to new heights of immersion.


Technical Details:

  • 17 Stereo WAV music tracks (16-bit/44.1kHz)
  • Bit rate: 1411 kbps
  • 311MB uncompressed
  • ~31 minutes of music
  • 12 seamlessly looping tracks
  • Royalty-Free license


**If you'd like to learn more about Andrew or his ongoing projects, visit andrewchamberscomposer.com
